q.quote: Education is not preparation for life, education is life itself.
q.author: John Dewey

q.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is love their mother.
q.author: Theodore Hesburgh

q.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
q.author: Albert Einstein

q.quote: I like to walk around with bare feet and I don't like to comb my hair.
q.author: Beyonce Knowles

q.quote: Everyone knows we get paid a lot of money, so why pretend otherwise?
q.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

q.quote: I write slowly. I actually write quickly, but I throw out so much material.
q.author: Dan Brown

q.quote: Humor is by far the most significant activity of the human brain.
q.author: Edward de Bono

q.quote: Innovation, being avant garde, is always polemic.
q.author: Ferran Adria

q.quote: We must say that there are as many squares as there are numbers.
q.author: Galileo Galilei

q.quote: Storytelling reveals meaning without committing the error of defining it
q.author: Hannah Arendt

q.quote: Each of us becomes a new person as we re-describe the past.
q.author: Ian Hacking

q.quote: I now truly believe it is impossible for me to make a bad movie.
q.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

q.quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.
q.author: Jon Bon Jovi

q.quote: What I enjoy most is doing something I've never done before
q.author: Karl Lagerfeld

q.quote: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning
q.author: Larry Page
